docs.snippet: Three seamen, who are alleged to have quit their berths on the steamship Algic of the American Republic Line when that vessel was in Montevideo, Uruguay, last Sept. 10, were arraigned yesterday before United States Commissioner Martin C. Epstein in...
docs.lead_paragraph: Three seamen, who are alleged to have quit their berths on the steamship Algic of the American Republic Line when that vessel was in Montevideo, Uruguay, last Sept. 10, were arraigned yesterday before United States Commissioner Martin C. Epstein in Brooklyn on a charge of conspiracy to deprive the captain of the Algic of authority and cormmand on board the vessel.
docs.abstract: plead not guilty; held for hearings

headline.main: THREE DENY SHIP PLOT; Seamen Held in Bail for Hearings Nov. 30 in Algic Case

docs.snippet: The establishment of a corporate State in Brazil by President Getulio Vargas late Wednesday and with it a declaration of the immediate suspension of all debt service on the country's external obligations caused a virtual collapse yesterday in the...
docs.lead_paragraph: The establishment of a corporate State in Brazil by President Getulio Vargas late Wednesday and with it a declaration of the immediate suspension of all debt service on the country's external obligations caused a virtual collapse yesterday in the market for outstanding Brazilian bonds.
